search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Caspio (caspio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Caspio is: [https://www.caspio.com/pricing/](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Low-Code Platform Pricing | Try Free Today | Caspio

extracted_content.content:

Ready to get started?
---------------------

Simply start with a [free trial](https://pages.caspio.com/free-trial) and convert when you’re ready — or [contact us](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#contact-sales) if you want a direct upgrade.

Enterprise, Compliance & Dedicated Plans
----------------------------------------

For large-scale deployments, compliance or fully dedicated environments, we offer additional plans with white-glove services.

[CONTACT US](https://www.caspio.com/contact-sales/?q=Enterprise%20Compliance%20or%20Dedicated)

You're in good company
----------------------

Caspio is trusted by over 15,000 businesses and enterprises across the globe

  ![Image 7: Logos of Caspio customers](https://cdn-bkknn.nitrocdn.com/fGcPNFYNoLNWGSllWzgDxtBAbrFDaIYE/assets/images/source/rev-4f70eb5/www.caspio.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/pricing_social_proof.svg)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

[Does Caspio really offer unlimited app users?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse1)

Absolutely! Caspio supports any number of users accessing internal or external apps, making it the ideal platform to power applications across your entire workforce and customer base. Each Caspio plan includes a specific number of data records and your users contribute toward this allocation. At any time, you can easily add thousands of additional records for a [nominal fee](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#add-on). With Caspio, you have the freedom to scale your applications without arbitrary limitations or per-seat fees.

[How many people can build apps in my account?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse2)

As many as you like! With Caspio, there’s no limit to the number of app developers you can invite to your account. Caspio provides fine-grain permission controls to manage user access to various objects in your account.

[What are DataPages/DataParts and how many do I need?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse3)

DataPages/DataParts are customizable forms, reports and interfaces that allow users to interact with your data. The number of DataPages/DataParts you need depends on the complexity and functionality of your app.

[Can I customize or change my plan?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse4)

Yes, you can update your plan with the features and [add-on resources](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#add-on) you need, such as additional data records, email/SMS notifications, file storage, etc. You may also upgrade your plan at any time or downgrade/cancel at the end of your term. Visit the Account Settings section inside your account to customize your plan.

[What happens if I exceed the usage limits in my plan?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse5)

To help you optimize your account resources and take advantage of our most cost-effective pricing, we’ll send you an email before you reach your limits, so you can decide to [add more resources](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#add-on) at a lower rate or pay on-demand.

[Can Caspio build applications for me?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse6)

Yes, we have an in-house Professional Services team specializing in advanced app development, customization, integration and maintenance. Additionally, our extensive partner network includes experienced Caspio developers across different regions and industries. We invite you to [schedule a free consultation](https://www.caspio.com/project-consultation/) to explore the possibilities.

[Does Caspio offer any discounts?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse7)

Caspio offers a 10% discount for annual payments. We also provide a 10% discount for nonprofits, NGOs and companies in qualifying countries. [See if you qualify](https://www.caspio.com/discount/).

For information on available promotional offers, please contact your sales representative or [contact us here](https://www.caspio.com/contact-sales/).

[Does Caspio offer an Academic program?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse8)

Yes, Caspio is available at no cost for educational institutions to teach database design and low-code application development in the classroom. [Learn more](https://www.caspio.com/academic-program/).

[What billing options are available?](https://www.caspio.com/pricing/#collapse9)

We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover credit cards, as well as GSA SmartPay cards. For annual payments, we also accept bank transfer and PayPal. [Contact Caspio Billing](https://www.caspio.com/contact-us/?topic=Billing) to arrange for non-credit card payments.

Scale Your Account
------------------

Add more capacity to your plan or pay on-demand if you exceed your plan's monthly allotment.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Caspio offers a variety of pricing tiers with unlimited app users and additional features based on the selected plan. Discounts are available for annual payments, nonprofits, and qualifying countries.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: An initial starting point with bigger possibilities ahead.
Robust features to digitize and automate processes.
Premium capabilities to drive operational excellence.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Discounts for nonprofits and qualifying countries.

additional_fees.fee_description: Quick setup and technical assistance to build your first Caspio app.
Hands-on guidance, planning and implementation including advanced topics.
